Nightshift nearly tips over in his vehicle mode while trying to stabilize h=
imself through a rough turn.  But even then, his front wheels catch an unse=
en fallen tree trunk, causing him to be airborne in SUV mode.  With no time=
 to catch his fall or transform into robot mode, he smacks the ground hard,=
 flipping multiple times!  His left drivers side door is completely torn of=
f as all the glass is shattered upon impact!  Finally he lands down hard on=
 his hood, completely upside down, tires spinning with no sign of life what=
 so ever.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 13, 2011, =
at 12:05 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >=

> > Nightshift stops short, spins around on his tires and speeds off towar=
d
> > Prowl's location, hoping to return his helping hand.
> >
> > " Hey! P=
ick on someone your own size ya overgrown lounge lizard!"
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> T=
here was a raor from SLAG as he chose to take NIGHTSHIFT up on his
> offer.=
 With a slight turn of his head he looked over at NIGHTSHIFT,
> opened his =
jaws and breathed, sending a huge fount of flames at him!
> 
> SLUDGE on th=
e other hand was still stuck in the fissure, bellowing
> loudly and angrill=
y at being so caught! He stomped on the ground,
> displaying his anger, and=
 having the intended affect of making it
> larger.
> 
> After a short thoug=
htful pause, as if working out something in his
> head he stopped stomping =
and shifted into his robot mode and began
> climbing out of the fissure!
> =

> In the air PROWL fired his lasers at SLAG hitting him in his flanks,
> h=
is powerful armor absorbing most of the affect. However there was a
> bello=
w of pain from the beast as he sought to bath PROWL again in
> fire.
> 
> P=
ROWL was able to dodge this time, moving higher into the air! "We
> need to=
 get these Dinobots . . . cons . . . whatever they are blocked
> off and qu=
ick. We are going to be able to take them head to head!"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Pr=
eston
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift nearly tips over in his veh=
icle mode while trying to stabilize himself through a rough turn.  But=
 even then, his front wheels catch an unseen fallen tree trunk, causing him=
 to be airborne in SUV mode.  With no time to catch his fall or transf=
orm into robot mode, he smacks the ground hard, flipping multiple times! &n=
bsp;His left drivers side door is completely torn off as all the glass is s=
hattered upon impact!  Finally he lands down hard on his hood, complet=
ely upside down, tires spinning with no sign of life what so ever.<br><br>P=
erpetually on the move and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Sep 13, =
2011, at 12:05 PM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@gmail=
.com">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><block=
quote type=3D"cite"><div>

    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>> <OLD><br>
&gt=
;<br>
> Nightshift stops short, spins around on his tires and speeds off=
 toward<br>
> Prowl's location, hoping to return his helping hand.<br>
&=
gt;<br>
> " Hey!  Pick on someone your own size ya overgrown lounge liza=
rd!"<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
There was a raor from SLAG as he chose t=
o take NIGHTSHIFT up on his<br>
offer. With a slight turn of his head he lo=
oked over at NIGHTSHIFT,<br>
opened his jaws and breathed, sending a huge f=
ount of flames at him!<br>
<br>
SLUDGE on the other hand was still stuck in=
 the fissure, bellowing<br>
loudly and angrilly at being so caught! He stom=
ped on the ground,<br>
displaying his anger, and having the intended affect=
 of making it<br>
larger.<br>
<br>
After a short thoughtful pause, as if wo=
rking out something in his<br>
head he stopped stomping and shifted into hi=
s robot mode and began<br>
climbing out of the fissure!<br>
<br>
In the air=
 PROWL fired his lasers at SLAG hitting him in his flanks,<br>
his powerful=
 armor absorbing most of the affect. However there was a<br>
bellow of pain=
 from the beast as he sought to bath PROWL again in<br>
fire.<br>
<br>
PROW=
L was able to dodge this time, moving higher into the air! "We<br>
need to =
get these Dinobots . . . cons . . . whatever they are blocked<br>
off and q=
uick. We are going to be able to take them head to head!"<br>
